description: This file is a Dart script intended for Continuous Integration (CI) purposes. It checks for the existence of a pubspec.yaml file in a specific directory, runs Flutter commands such as pub get, analyze, and test, and handles command execution and error reporting.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Asynchronously executes the main logic for the CI script, including checking for the pubspec.yaml, running Flutter commands, and handling errors.

methods.name: run
methods.description: Helper function to run a command asynchronously within the specified app directory, with optional environment variables, and handle non-zero exit codes.
